entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 2:59PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW POSSIBLE ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... Confidence is increasing in the potential for accumulating snow across the northern panhandle late Tuesday night into Wednesday. The best chance for accumulating snow at sea level is over Haines. As the storm system lifts northward Wednesday, expect a changeover to rain for Haines late morning to early afternoon.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan
